title: Video: Ben Khan – Youth
content:
Having already cemented his position as one of the artists of the year, through the release of his fantastic debut EP, 1992, 21 year old Ben Khan has released trippy visuals for EP standout Youth.

As delirious and devilishly intriguing as the song itself, it seemingly draws influences from 80’s horror flicks, providing an uneasy, yet immersive watch. Directed by BRTHR (Foster The People, Charli XCX, Klaxons), it’s a fitting accompaniment to one of 2014’s best tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
